-This app is used to fill the server without passing through the MQTT broker and setting up the watertank-mock tool. It allows direct(manual) insertion.
- ~10000 insertions per 10min



-Data template (manual insert)
-time, tank_id, current_volume, client_id, zone_code,total_capacity

2025-02-01 12:00:00,A9742E53-48B5-4847-AF01-04F1104980FE,500,3D5DF52A-5160-4D48-905D-A62851CCACA1,ZC-HELLO,1000
2025-02-01 12:00:00,A9742E53-48B5-4847-AF01-04F1104980FE,482,3D5DF52A-5160-4D48-905D-A62851CCACA1,ZC-HELLO,1000
2025-02-01 12:00:00,A9742E53-48B5-4847-AF01-04F1104980FE,473,3D5DF52A-5160-4D48-905D-A62851CCACA1,ZC-HELLO,1000
2025-02-01 12:00:00,A9742E53-48B5-4847-AF01-04F1104980FE,440,3D5DF52A-5160-4D48-905D-A62851CCACA1,ZC-HELLO,1000
2025-02-01 12:00:00,A9742E53-48B5-4847-AF01-04F1104980FE,438,3D5DF52A-5160-4D48-905D-A62851CCACA1,ZC-HELLO,1000

2025-02-01 12:00:00,A9742E53-48B5-4847-AF01-04F1104980FE,414,3D5DF52A-5160-4D48-905D-A62851CCACA1,ZC-HELLO,1000







-example with errors: (manual insert)
2025-01-01 12:00:00,C05471B-7B777-442D-900F-55479B799444,500,8C3BDB05-8277-4A45-93F5-DDBBE2235562,RC-002Z,1000
2025-01-02 12:00:00,C05471BC-7B77-442D-900F-55479B799444,450,8C3BDB05-8277-4A45-93F5-DDBBE2235562,RC-002Z,
2025-01-02 12:00:00,C05471BC-7B77-442D-900F-55479B799444,450,8C3BDB05-8277-4A45-93F5-DDBBE2235562,RC-002Z,hello
